Sentencas: The glass structure, wetting behavior and crystallization of BaC-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 system glass containing 2-10 mol% Al2O3 were investigated.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The introduction of Al2O3 caused the conversion of [BO3] units and [BO4] units to each other and it played as glass network former when the content was up to 10 mol%, accompanied by [BO4] ->
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell
Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The stability of the glass improved first and then decreased as Al2O3 increased from 2 to 10 mol%, the glass with 5 mol% Al2O3 being the most stable one.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The wetting behavior of the glasses indicates that excess Al2O3 leads to high sealing temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The glass containing 5 mol% Al2O3 characterized by a lower sealing temperature is suitable for SOFC sealing.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Al2O3 improves the crystallization temperature of the glass.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The crystal phases in the reheated glasses are mainly composed of Ba2Si3O8, BaSiO3, BaB2O4 and BaAl2Si2O8.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Al2O3 helps the crystallization of BaSiO3 and BaAl2Si2O8.
Titulo: Effect of Al2O3 content on BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell
